name: Cosmic Calamity
description:
How to Play:

1. Move! Find a safe position for your tank.
2. Aim! Aim your shot to hit other players tanks.
3. Fire! Every player will shoot at the same time, try and stay alive for as long as you can!

Controls (Player 1 / Player 2 / Player3 / Player 4):
Rotate Counter-Clockwise - Q / I / Z / B
Rotate Clockwise - W / O / X / N
Drive Forward - E / P / C / M

Credits:
